channel.description: Recent content in about me on Cybersecurity Blog!

item.title: About Me
item.description: Hello and welcome! I’m a Bay Area native and Sr. Cloud Security Engineer at CBS Interactive. I’m currently pursuing my Master’s in Software Engineering (Cybersecurity Concentration) with San Jose State University and enjoying its relevance with my career trajectory! This blog will be a platform to share my passion and knowledge in Cybersecurity. I’ll be focusing on the areas of Cloud Security/Penetration Testing and the coalescence of the two. I also look forward to documenting my journey with certifications such as: eJPT, eCPPT, OSCP, AWS/GCP certifications and many more!
